document_notes.text:
This update for ncurses fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2017-13733: Fix illegal address access in the fmt_entry function (bsc#1056127).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: There is an illegal address access in the fmt_entry function in progs/dump_entry.c in ncurses 6.0 that might lead to a remote denial of service attack.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
